channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: US signals broader efforts to protect Nigeria's Christians following Trump's military threat
item.description: President Donald Trump’s administration is promoting efforts to work with Nigeria’s government to counter violence against Christians

item.title: Big changes to the agency charged with securing elections lead to midterm worries
item.description: The federal agency that oversees the security of election systems was largely absent from planning before elections this month in several states

item.title: Mamdani stands by Trump criticism despite friendly White House meeting
item.description: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is standing by his past criticisms that President Donald Trump acted like a despot and a fascist

item.title: Gunman who killed Florida deputy dies from injuries after eviction notice shooting
item.description: Authorities say a gunman who killed a Florida sheriff's deputy earlier this week died of his wounds Saturday from the confrontation

item.title: Christmas tree retailers find lots to like at a Pennsylvania wholesale auction
item.description: Christmas went on the auction block this week in Pennsylvania farm country in the form of a giant Christmas tree sale
